class_notes:
(Same as ENVS 375 1)
Course will include 7-10 days of travel for field activities.
course_description: This course will explore coastal and near-shore tropical marine ecosystems including mangroves and coral reefs. Readings will review key concepts of marine ecology with a focus on local ecosystems. Field excursions to local sites will provide opportunities to learn from researchers and managers.
prerequisites: ENVS 131 or ENVS_OX 131 or BIOL 141 or BIOL_OX 141 or BIOL 142 or BIOL_OX 142 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1640, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MTWThF 9a-12:30p, Instructor: C. Keogh, Status: Open
